solution_line_template: If a bunny comes out of its hole three times in a minute, in an hour, with {minutes_per_hour} minutes, the bunny will come out of the hole {minutes_per_hour}*{bunny_frequency_per_minute}=<<{minutes_per_hour}*{bunny_frequency_per_minute}={bunny_frequency_per_hour}>>{bunny_frequency_per_hour} times.

In {total_hours} hours, a bunny will come out of their hole {bunny_frequency_per_hour}*{total_hours}=<<{bunny_frequency_per_hour}*{total_hours}={bunny_frequency_total_hours}>>{bunny_frequency_total_hours} times.

The combined time that {num_bunnies} bunnies coming out of their holes will have taken in {total_hours} hours is {bunny_frequency_total_hours}*{num_bunnies}=<<{bunny_frequency_total_hours}*{num_bunnies}={combined_frequency}>>{combined_frequency} times.
